channel.description: The best time to plant a tree was 10 years ago, the second is now

item.title: 线程池
item.author: ricky
item.description: 我是零.线程池的主要作用 降低资源消耗：创建线程（分配栈内存）和销毁线程都是消耗资源的，通过线程池可以重复利用已创建的线程，降低线程创建和销毁

item.title: 阻塞队列-双锁实现
item.author: ricky
item.description: 前提摘要 在阻塞队列-单锁的实现中，消费 （poll） 和 生产 （offer） 两个方法都是用了同一个锁，也就是会发生队列中有元素，但消费方却有可能等

item.title: Learing English is not a rocket science.
item.author: ricky
item.description: Why i learned English I recently watched some interesting videos on bilibli which is about communicating with foreigners in English on website. The videos was so funny that it made me have the idea of relearning the skill of English language . You know，i recently started to practise my english from multiple aspects 。Literally,m

item.title: English_grammar_modal_verbs
item.author: ricky
item.description: 英语中的情态动词（Modal Verbs）用于表达可能性、能力、允许、建议、必要性、义务、愿望等概念。它们在句子中通常与动词原形连用，不需要其

item.title: English_knowledge_points
item.author: ricky
item.description: or 并不是所有情况下“or”连接的主语都使用单数动词。选择使用单数或复数动词，取决于“or”连接的主语是否为单数或复数，以及主语的排列方式。 规

item.title: English_new_concept_english4
item.author: ricky
item.description: Lesson5 Youth 青年 People are always talking about ’the problem of youth’. If there is one – which I take leave to doubt – then it is older people who create it, not the young themselves. Let us get down to fundamentals and agree that the young are after all human beings – people just like their elders. There is only one difference between an old man and a

item.author: ricky
